features.name: User Authentication
features.description: JWT-based authentication system with user registration, login, and password hashing

features.name: Stock Market Data
features.description: Real-time stock data fetching, WebSocket connections, and price monitoring

features.name: Cryptocurrency Data
features.description: Binance WebSocket integration for real-time crypto prices and trading data

features.name: Carbon Credit Management
features.description: Carbon credit project data ingestion, storage, and real-time monitoring

features.name: AI Forecasting Models
features.description: Prophet, ARIMA, and Simple forecasting models for stocks, crypto, and carbon credits

features.name: Unified WebSocket Service
features.description: Centralized service managing multiple WebSocket connections for different data sources

features.name: Dashboard Analytics
features.description: Comprehensive dashboard with real-time data, charts, and performance metrics

features.name: Real-time Data Streaming
features.description: WebSocket-based real-time data streaming for stocks, crypto, and carbon credits

features.name: Data Validation
features.description: Input validation middleware for API endpoints and data integrity

features.name: Frontend Components
features.description: Reusable React components with modern UI/UX design

features.name: API Integration
features.description: RESTful API endpoints for all data sources and services

features.name: Database Models
features.description: PostgreSQL database models and data access layer

features.name: Testing Framework
features.description: Comprehensive testing suite including unit tests, integration tests, and custom TestSprite diagnostics

features.name: Security Features
features.description: JWT authentication, password hashing, rate limiting, and security middleware

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Comprehensive error handling and logging throughout the application
